Package rsg.mailchimp.api

Interface Summary
RPCStructConverter  
 

Class Summary
Constants Yay, constants.
HelperMethods Coverage of the Helper methods in the api
See the helper methods: http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/
MailChimpApi This is the main class for doing operations with the MailChimp API.
MailChimpErrorMessage This class is a generic handling of error messages from the API in functions like batch subscribe.
SecurityMethods Provides support for the security methods.
Utils Utility functions
 

Enum Summary
Constants.CampaignStatus Enum for campaign status
Constants.CampaignType Enum for campaign types
Constants.EmailType Enum of email types
Constants.InterestGroupType Enum of interest group types
Constants.MergeFieldType Enum of merge field types - see: http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/listmergevaradd.func.php
Constants.SubscribeStatus Enum of user list subscribe statuses
 

Exception Summary
MailChimpApiException
